K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:75a-10: rkyen des lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:75a-12: sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:75a-14: yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:75a-15: 'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs shing yang dag par lta ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:75a-16: yang dag par lta ba'i chos dang las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus rgyu de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:75a-17: rkyen des lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha dang mi rnams su skye par 'gyur ro zhes rab tu mkhyen to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:75a-18: de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs te rtag tu bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:75a-19: 'grus skyong dang ldan zhing byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos rnams la sgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes su mthun pas bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:75b-0: de nam gyi thun tha ma la zag pa zad pa'i shes @75b pa mngon sum du bya ba'i shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhag pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:75b-1: des 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:75b-4: 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:75b-5: de de ltar shes shing de ltar mthong na 'dod pa'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:75b-7: ma rig pa'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:75b-8: rnam par grol na bdag gis skye ba ni zad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:75b-9: tshangs par spyod pa la bsten to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:75b-11: 'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes de nyid du yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes thugs su chud par gyur cing de ltar bcom ldan 'das nam gyi thun tha ma la bdud 'byung po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug dang bcas pa las byams pa'i mtshon gyis mngon par rgyal te bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:75b-12: de nas bdud sdig can gyi lag pa nas gzhu shor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:75b-13: rgyal mtshan rtse mo thur du lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:76a-0: de nas bdud sdig can 'byung po'i 'khor bye ba phrag gsum cu rtsa drug dang bcas par sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la yid la bcags te de nyid du mi snang @76a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:76a-1: bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:76a-2: sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la pham par gyur pas sems pa la zhugs te mdas sa la 'dre zhing gnas par gyur to; ;de nas bdud kyi bu mo sred ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:76a-4: dga' spyod ma zhes bya ba bdud gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:76a-5: yab khyod ci phyir thugs mi dgyes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:76a-6: ci yi phyir na 'di ltar bzhugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:76a-7: gang gis khyod la gnod byed pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:76a-8: skyes bu gang la rjes su sems //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:76a-9: gsungs shig de ni 'dod chags kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:76a-10: zhags pas nags nas glang po bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:76a-11: bcings nas bdag cag 'tshal te mchi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:76a-12: de ni khyod kyi dbang du gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:76a-14: skyes bu 'dod chags rab bral te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:76a-15: chags pas legs par dgug mi nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:76a-16: bdud kyi yul 'das de yi phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:76a-17: nga ni shin tu mya ngan byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:76a-21: bdud kyi bu mo gsum po sprin las byung ba'i glog bzhin du gzi brjid rab tu 'bar zhing rang gi gnas nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su song ste phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:76a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:76b-0: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la bdud sdig can gyi bu mo gsum gyis 'di skad @76b ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:76b-1: kye dge sbyong khyod kyi zhabs la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyi ri ma gro bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:76b-2: bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang sred pa yang dag par zad cing rnam par grol la thugs yang dag par shin tu rnam par grol ba bla na med pa brnyes pas de la dgongs par ma mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:76b-3: lan gnyis lan gsum du'ang bcom ldan 'das la bdud kyi bu mo gsum gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:76b-4: kye dge sbyong khyod kyi zhabs la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyi rim gro bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:76b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gnyis lan gsum du'ang ci nas kyang sred pa yang dag par zad cing rnam par grol la thugs yang dag par shin tu rnam par grol ba bla na med pa brnyes pas de la dgongs par ma mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:76b-6: de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum phyogs gcig tu song ste phan tshun smra zhing kun tu bgros pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:76b-8: skyes pa rnams kyis bud med la sred pa ni tha dad pa yin pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:76b-9: ma la bdag cag gis gzhon nu ma mdog mdangs brgya phrag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:76b-11: kha dog brgya phrag dang bcas par mngon par sprul zhing bu btsas ma myong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:77a-0: lan bzhi btsas par mngon par sprul zhing bud med par ma'i tshul brgya phrag tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul la @77a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:77a-1: dge sbyong goo ta ma gang na ba der nye bar 'gro bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:77a-2: phyin nas kyang dge spyong goo ta ma la 'di skad ces dge sbyong khyod kyi zhabs la bsnyen bkur byed cing bde bar gshegs pa khyod la rim gro pa bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:77a-4: de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum po gzhon nu'i mdog brgya stong du mar bdag nyid mngon par sprul cing gos kha dog brgya phrag dang bcas pa nas ji srid du bud med par ma'i tshul brgya phrag tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:77a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:77a-6: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:77a-7: kye dge sbyong khyod kyi zhabs la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyi rim gro ba bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:77a-8: bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang sred pa yang dag par zad cing rnam par grol la thugs yang dag par shin tu rnam par grol ba bla na med pa brnyes pas de la dgongs par ma mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:77a-9: lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das la bdud kyi bu mo gsum gyis de skad gsol kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:77a-10: lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dgongs par ma mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:77b-0: de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum phyogs gcig tu @77b song nas phan tshun 'di skad ces smra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:77b-2: 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i skyes bu dag 'di lta bu'i thabs mang pos nye bar bsten cing gnas na de'i sems g-yengs par 'gyur ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:77b-4: kha nas khrag dron po skyug par 'gyur ba'i gnas de ni yod na dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di ni 'u bu cag la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:77b-5: sems gtod par mi byed kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:77b-6: skyes pa rnams kyis bud med la sred pa ni tha dad pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:77b-7: ma la bdag cag bud med rgan mo'i tshul brgya phrag tu mngon par sprul la dge sbyong goo ta ma'i gan du 'gro na de lta na ni dge sbyong goo ta ma bdag cag rnams la 'dun pa skyed pa'ang srid par 'gyur gyi zhes smras te bdud kyi bu mo gsum po bud med rgan mo'i tshul brgya phrag tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:77b-8: snga ma bzhin du bsnyen bkur bgyid pa'i bar du gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:77b-9: bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang sred pa yang dag par zad cing rnam par grol la thugs yang dag par shin tu rnam par grol ba bla na med pa brnyes pas de la dgongs par ma mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:77b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:77b-11: 'di dag ni rang nyid kyis rgan mo'i dngos por byas pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78a-0: ma la ngas kyang 'di rnams nyid kun tu skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir rgan pa 'di nyid du byin gyis brlab par bya'o snyam nas bcom ldan @78a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78a-1: 'das kyis bdud kyis bu mo rgan mor byin gyis brlabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78a-2: de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum po rgan pa de mi snang bar bya bar 'dod kyang mi snang bar bya bar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78a-3: de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum po bsam pa yongs su ma rdzogs shing gzugs kyis ngo tsha ba bzhin du rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78a-4: sgur po phyam dgu po ltar kyang kyor can mdun nas 'khar ba la rten cing lus 'dar bzhin du bdud sdig can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78a-5: skyes bu 'dod chags rab bral te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78a-6: chags pas legs par dgug mi nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78a-7: bdud kyi yul 'das de yi phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78a-8: nga ni shin tu mya ngan byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78a-9: ces bdag cag rnams la gsung ba ni yab med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78a-10: gang zhig gzhan sems rmongs byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78a-11: bdag cag gis ni ma byas pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78a-12: rnam pa de ni yod min na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78a-13: de lta na yang dbang ma gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78a-15: byas nas de gan nyer song na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78a-16: ji ltar rgan pa nyid gnas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78a-17: de ltar de yis byin gyis brlabs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78a-18: de bas yab kyis bdag cag rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78a-19: rgas pa 'di ni mi snang mdzod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78a-21: khyed rnams gzugs kyis dregs nas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78a-22: sprin gyi tshogs las glog bzhin du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78a-23: gzi brjid rab tu 'bar ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78a-24: spro ba'i nga rgyal gnas pas song //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78b-0: dpa' chen de gan phyin pa @78b dang; ;rlung gis shing bal bzhin du brlag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78b-1: gang zhig chags kun mthar 'byin pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78b-2: sangs rgyas la 'dir gnod byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78b-3: ri bo sen mos rko ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78b-4: so yis lcags ni 'cha' ba dang; ;padma gzhon nu'i sdong bu yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78b-5: ri bo gzhig par 'dod pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78b-6: gang zhig chags kun mthar 'byin pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78b-8: rgya mtsho brkos par gyur nas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78b-9: zab pa'i gting tshol 'dod pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78b-10: gang zhig chags kun mthar 'byin pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78b-12: rlung ni zhags pas 'ching ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78b-13: zla ba mkha' las dbab pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78b-14: rgya mtsho lag pas 'chu ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78b-15: gangs can la ni rgal ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78b-16: snang zhing sreg bcas 'bar ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78b-18: gang zhig dka' ba byed 'dod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78b-20: ji srid thub pa de nyid la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78b-21: skyabs su 'gro bar gyis shig dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78b-22: de nyid rgas pa'i gzugs 'di ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78b-24: de ni thugs rje cher ldan pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78b-25: nges par khyed kyi sal bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78b-26: 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78b-28: tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:78b-30: bram zer bcas pa'i skyed gu rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79a-0: lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na khyed rnams kyi rga ba'i dngos po mi snang bar byed pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs @79a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79a-1: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid las gzhan dag gang yang ma mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79a-2: khyed rnams song la bcom ldan 'das de nyid mnyes par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79a-3: de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79a-4: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79a-6: bdag cag gis byis pa ji lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79a-7: rmongs pa ji lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79a-8: mi gsal ba ji lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79a-9: thabs mi mkhas pa ji lta bar ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par bgyi ba mnyes par ma bgyis pa ni nongs lags kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79a-13: bzod par mdzad du gsol; bcom ldan 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79a-14: bdag cag gi rgas pa'i dngos po mi snang bar mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79a-16: bdag cag gi rgas pa'i dngos po mi snang bar mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams rgas pa'i dngos po mi snang bar mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79b-0: de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum po rang gi gzugs nyid rnyed nas bcom @79b ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo pos phyag byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79b-1: bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79b-2: de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79b-3: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang la rang gi skyes bu rnams kyis; lha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79b-5: gzhon nus bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79b-6: de thos pa dang nyi ma de nyid la grags 'dzin ma la'ang khye'u zhig btsas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79b-7: bdud rtsi zas la'ang khye'u zhig btsas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79b-8: de nyid kyi nyin mo zla ba'ang sgra gcan gyis zin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79b-9: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis phun sum tshogs pa de mthong nas dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79b-12: rangs pa rgya chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79b-13: yid bde ba skyes par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79b-14: de nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi rdo ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79b-16: gyo mo rnams bsal nas tsandan gyi chus chag chag btab /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79b-17: shin tu dri zhim pa'i pog por nye bar bshams /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79b-18: dar gyi chun 'phyang mang por dpyangs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79b-21: me tog sna tshogs kyis dga' dga' ltar bkram nas grong khyer gyi sgo bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79b-22: sum mdo rnams su'ang sbyin gtong gi khang pa brtsigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79b-23: de nas grong khyer gyi shar sgor dge sbyong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79b-25: spyod pa pa dang; kun tu rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:79b-30: slong mo pa rnams la'ang sbyin pa dag gtong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:80a-1: sum mdo rnams su'ang sbyin pa dag gtong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:80a-3: grags 'dzin ma'i bu'i ming 'dogs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:80a-4: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi skye pos smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:80a-5: 'di btsas pa na zla ba sgra gcan gyis zin pas de bas na khye'u'i ming sgra gcan zin zhes gdags so zhes btags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:80a-6: bdud rtsi zas kyi yang de bzhin du sbyin pa dag btang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:80a-7: bsod nams dag byas nas khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes bu'i ming 'dogs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:80a-8: nye du dag gis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:80a-9: gang gi tshe 'di btsas pa na grong khyer thams cad dga' bar gyur pas de'i phyir khye'u'i ming kun dga' bor gdags so zhes btags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:80a-10: rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:80a-11: grags 'dzin ma'i bu gang yin pa 'di ni sh'akya thub pa'i bu ma yin no zhes smras pa grags 'dzin mas thos nas yi chad par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:80a-12: de nas des byang chub sems dpa'i phang tshad kyi pha pong la bskyon nas rol pa'i rdzing 'gram du 'dug ste bden pa gsol ba btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:80a-13: gal te 'di byang chub sems dpa' las skyes pa yin na de bzhin du rdzing 'dir pha pong dang lhan cig 'phyo bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:80a-14: ji ste ma yin na bying bar gyur cig ces smras nas chur por ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:80a-15: de shing bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du pha bong dang lhan cig 'phyo bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:80b-0: rgyal po zas gtsang gis ya mtshan du @80b gyur pa de thos nas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:80b-3: mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:80b-6: rangs pa rgya chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:80b-8: de ma thag tu rdzing der zhugs nas gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po pang du blangs nas langs so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:80b-14: der sems can gang dag skyes pa de rnams kyis snang ba des sems can gcig gis gcig mthong nas /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:83a-0: bdag gis sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis srog chags rnams la phan @83a *//

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:84a-19: bzang po bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:84b-0: de na sbrang rtsi'ang rlung slong la 'de gu'ang rlung @84b slong ba des na bcom ldan 'das rlung nad kyi snyun gyis thebs so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:85a-0: kye ma'o dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o snyam du bsams nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la 'gyod pas de nyid du mi @85a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:85a-2: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das rlung nad kyi snyun gyis thebs par rig nas shing dzambu zhes bya bas dzambu'i gling du gdags pa gang yin pa de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na aa ru ra chen po'i tshal yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:85a-5: ro dang ldan pa'i aa ru ra blangs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:85a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:85a-7: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:85a-9: bser ma'i snyun nad kyi snyun gyis thebs par bdag gis 'tshal nas shing dzambu zhes bya bas dzambu'i gling du gdags pa gang lags pa de dang ha cang mi ring ba na aa ru ra chen po'i tshal mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:85a-10: de nas bdag gis kha dog dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:85a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis de gsol pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:90a-18: lnga sde'i dge slong rnams da lta gang na 'dug snyam nas bcom ldan 'das kyi lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi rnams kyi las 'das pas lnga sde'i dge slong rnams w'a ra n'a si na drang srong smra ba ri dvags kyi gnas na 'khod pa gzigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:90b-0: gzigs @90b nas kyang ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas w'a ra n'a si'i ka shi'i grong rdal gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:90b-1: de'i tshe kun tu 'tsho nyer 'gro lam de nyid du lam du zhugs par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:90b-2: kun tu 'tsho nyer 'gros bcom ldan 'das lam nas gshegs pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:90b-3: mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:90b-5: khyod kyi dbang po rnams ni dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:90b-6: bzhin gyi mdog ni yongs su dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:90b-7: pags pa'i mdog ni bsal na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:90b-8: tshe dang ldan pa goo tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:90b-9: khyod kyi ston pa ni gang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:90b-10: khyod su las brten te rab tu byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:90b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:90b-13: nga dang 'dra ba yod min pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:90b-14: nga la slob dpon 'ga' med de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:90b-15: 'jig rten sangs rgyas nga gcig pu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:90b-16: yang dag byang chub dam pa thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:90b-17: thams cad zil mnan 'jig rten kun mkhyen la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:90b-18: 'di ni chos kun gyis ni nga ma gos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:90b-19: thams cad spangs shing sred bral rnam grol te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:90b-20: rang gis mngon par shes nas su la rten //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:90b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa lha mi'i ston pa po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:90b-22: thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs ni kun ldan pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:90b-23: nyid kyis byang chub rtogs nas rab gsungs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:90b-24: mi nyams mtshungs pa med na su la rten //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:90b-25: nga ni 'jig rten dgra bcom ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:90b-26: 'jig rten bla med nga yin pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:90b-27: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91a-2: tshe dang ldan pa goo ta ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91a-4: gang gis zag pa zad thob pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91a-5: rgyal ba nga 'drar shes par bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91a-6: sdig pa'i chos ni ngas bcom pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91a-7: de bas nyer 'gro nga rgyal ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91a-8: tshe dang ldan pa goo tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91a-10: w'a ra n'a sir gshegs nas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91a-11: ngas ni chos kyi rnga brdung zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91a-12: 'jig rten ma bskor gang yin pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91a-13: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91a-14: 'jig rten chags pa las brgal ba'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91a-15: kun mkhyen sangs rgyas zhi gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91a-16: 'jig rten bsgral ba ma byas par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91a-17: skyes bu dam pa grags mi srid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91a-18: tshe dang ldan pa goo ta ma rgyal ba legs so zhes gsol nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91a-19: kun tu 'tsho nyer 'gro lam nas song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ka shi'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na w'a ra n'a sir byon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91a-21: de'i tshe lnga sde'i dge slong rnams w'a ra n'a si na drang srong smra ba ri dvags kyi nags na 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91a-22: lnga sde'i dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po kho nas mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91a-23: mthong nas kyang phan tshun nas ched du bsams te legs par 'dug nas khrims su bcas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91a-29: spong ba nyams pa deng 'bras chan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91a-30: zan dron gyi kha zas la mang du za zhing lus mar sar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91b-0: til mar gyis byugs @91b nas chu 'jam pos lus khrus byed cing 'ong gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91b-1: de bdag cag gi drung du 'ongs pa dang de la smra bar mi bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91b-4: langs te stan bstab par mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91b-5: gzhan du na stan nar ma kho nar bting ba la tshig 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa goo ta ma stan yod kyi ji ste 'dod na 'dug cing ces brjod par bya'o zhes bcas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91b-6: bcom ldan 'das ji lta ji ltar lnga sde'i dge slong rnams la gzigs pa'i phyir nye bar gshegs pa de lta de ltar lnga sde'i dge slong rnams bcom ldan 'das gzi brjid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91b-8: bkur stim bzod nas stan las langs te kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan shom mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91b-9: kha cig ni zhabs bkru ba'i chu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91b-10: zhabs kyi rten dag mtha' gcig tu 'jog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91b-12: na bza' chos gos dag blangs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91b-19: gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig ces zer ro; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91b-20: kye ma skyes bu blun po 'di rnams kyis khrims bcas nas rang gis bshig go snyam du mkhyen nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91b-21: de nas lnga sde'i dge slong rnams lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan nas brjod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:91b-23: tshe dang ldan pas rjod pas kun tu rjod par byed do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:92a-3: khyed lhag par yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nas rjod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:92a-5: tshe dang ldan pas rjod pas kun tu ma rjod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:92a-6: khyed la yun ring por gnod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:92a-7: phan pa ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:92a-9: de ci'i phyir zhe na; dge slong dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:92a-10: gang la la lhag par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nas rjod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:92a-12: tshe dang ldan pas rjod pa'i kun tu rjod pa de ni skyes bu blun po de la yun ring por gnod pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:92b-10: 'dod pa rnams la 'dod pa'i sa bon nams kyi rjes su brtson pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:92b-12: tha chad ma rabs gang yin pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:95b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis w'a ra n'a sir drang srong smra ba ri dvags kyi nags su lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang ldan pa bskor bas de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes tshigs bla dvags su btags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:95b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gnyis su yang lnga sde'i dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:95b-18: bzhi gang zhe na; sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:95b-21: sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:95b-22: sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:95b-24: rga ba sdug bsngal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:95b-25: na ba sdug bsngal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:96a-0: sdug pa dang bral ba sdug bsngal @96a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:96a-2: mi sdug pa dang phrad pa sdug bsngal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:96a-3: gang 'dod pa btsal te ma rnyed pa de'ang sdug bsngal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:96a-4: mdor na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sdug bsngal ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:96a-5: de yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:96a-6: sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na; yang srid pa'i sred pa dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa de dang de la mngon par 'dod pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:96a-7: de spang ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o; ;sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i ba den pa gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:96a-8: yang srid pa'i sred pa dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:96a-9: de la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de nyid ma lus par spangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:96a-16: nub pa ste de mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:96a-17: sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:96a-23: yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:96b-3: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te de yang bsgom par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:96b-4: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na tshe dang ldan pa kun shes koondi n+ya len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:96b-5: lnga sde'i dge slong lhag ma rnams la ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so; ;de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa gcig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:96b-6: gnyis pa ni bcom ldan 'das so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:96b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong lnga sde'i lhag ma rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:96b-8: dge slong dag ;gzugs ni bdag ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:96b-10: gal te gzugs bdag yin na gzugs la gnod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:96b-12: gzugs la bdag gi gzugs 'di lta bur gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:96b-13: 'di lta bur ma gyur cig snyam na yang 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:96b-15: gang gi phyir gzugs bdag ma yin pa de'i phyir gzugs la gnod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:96b-16: sdug bsngal bar 'gyur zhing gzugs la bdag gi gzugs 'di lta bu 'gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:96b-17: 'di lta bur ma gyur cig snyam pa yang 'thob par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:96b-22: rnam par shes pa ni bdag ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:96b-24: gal te rnam par shes pa bdag yin na rnam par shes pa la gnod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:97a-1: rnam par shes pa la bdag gi rnam par shes pa 'di lta bur gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:97a-2: 'di lta bur ma gyur cig snyam na yang 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:97a-4: gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa bdag ma yin pa de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la gnod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:97a-5: sdug bsngal bar 'gyur zhing rnam par shes pa la bdag gi rnam par shes pa 'di lta bur gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:97a-6: 'di lta bur ma gyur cig snyam na yang 'thob par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:97a-13: mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:97a-17: mi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la cig 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa de la 'di ni bdag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:97a-19: 'di ni bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag tu khas len tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:97a-22: dge slong dag ;ji snyam du sems /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:97a-26: rnam par shes pa rtag gam mi rtag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:97a-29: mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:97b-0: mi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la gcig 'phags pa @97b nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:97b-2: 'di ni bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag tu khas len tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:97b-6: de lta bas na gzugs gang yin pa de ci yang rung ba 'das pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:97b-15: gang dag thag nye ba de dag thams cad ni bdag ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:97b-17: de ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no zhes ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag ba'i shes rab kyis blta bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:97b-19: de lta bas na tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:97b-22: rnam par shes pa ji snyed pa gang ci'ang rung ba 'das pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:97b-32: gang dag thag nye ba de dag thams cad ni bdag ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:97b-34: de ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no zhes ji lta ba de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis blta bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:97b-36: 'di ltar 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di bdag ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:97b-37: bdag gi ma yin par lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:97b-38: de de ltar lta ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98a-1: do; ;len pa med pa na yongs su gdung ba med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98a-2: yongs su gdung ba med na bdag nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ste bdag gi skye ba zad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98a-3: tshangs par spyod pa la bsten to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98a-5: srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98a-6: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na lnga sde'i dge slong lhag ma rnams kyis len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98a-7: de'i tshe dgra bcom pa lnga dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98a-8: drug pa ni bcom ldan 'das so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das w'a ra n'a si'i 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98a-10: de'i tshe w'a ra n'a si na rigs kyi gtso bo zhes bya ba'i bu grags pa zhes bya ba zhig gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98a-11: de nyi ma re re zhing bud med kyis byas pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98a-12: dga' mgur spyod par byed pas lus snyoms /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98a-14: lus rgud pas myur du gnyid log par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98a-15: bud med de rnams kyang lus snyoms /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98a-17: lus rgud pas gnyid log par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98a-18: rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa mtshan mo gnyid sad pa na bud med de dag thams cad brdol zhing sgron mor byung la skra zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98a-19: lag pa brkyang ste byung rgyal du bla ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98a-20: mthong nas kyang de dag gi chung ma la dur khrod kyi 'du shes skyes par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98a-21: de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa mal chen po la babs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98b-0: rin @98b po che'i lha ma brgya stong ri ba zung gcig gyon nas nyal khang gi sgo ga na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98b-4: bdag ni nyams so zhes skad ngan phyung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98b-5: de'i sgo mi ma yin pa rnams kyis phye nas skad kyang mi grag par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98b-6: de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98b-10: bdag ni nyams so zhes skad ngan pa byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98b-11: de'i sgo mi ma yin pa rnams kyis phye nas skad kyang mi grag par byas so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98b-17: de'i sgo mi ma yin pa rnams kyis phye nas skad kyang mi grag par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98b-18: de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa 'bab chu gnod pa can de gang na ba der song ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98b-19: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol bla gab med pa na rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa 'ong ba la yang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98b-20: yang du bzhengs shing 'chag pas 'chag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:98b-21: rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pas bcom ldan 'das 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na 'chag pa rgyang ring po !nas mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:99a-0: bdag ni nyams so zhes skad ngan phyung @99a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:99a-1: ngo; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:99a-4: gnas 'di ni khyod la 'tshe ba med pa yin; 'di ni nyams pa med pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:99a-5: de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri bzung gcig po 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram du phud nas 'bab chu gnod pa can brgal te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:99a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:99a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa khrid de nyid kyi gtsug lag khang gang na ba der gshegs nas byon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:99a-8: gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:99a-9: bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:99a-12: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:99a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam gleng ba gang yin pa 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:99a-17: 'dod pa rnams la mnog chung zhing nyes dmigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:99a-18: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:99b-0: rab @99b tu dben pa'i rjes su bsgrags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:99b-1: rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams rgya cher bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:99b-2: gang gi tshe de bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ba'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:99b-5: sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:99b-6: skal ba dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:99b-7: yang dag phul gyi chos bshad na shes par nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa gang yin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:99b-9: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:99b-12: lam ste rgya cher bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:99b-14: gos gtsang ma nag nog med pa tshon rtsi 'os pa'i nang du bcug na tshon rtsi legs par 'jen du btubs pa de bzhin du rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:99b-20: de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa chos mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:99b-23: chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:99b-24: som nyi las rgal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:99b-25: the tshom las rgal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:99b-26: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:99b-27: gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:100a-0: ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na @100a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:100a-1: ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:100a-7: dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis lags kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:100a-8: bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:100a-9: deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:100a-10: bran mo zhig de nyid kyi mtshan mo gnyid log pa las sad na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:100a-11: gzhon nu grags pa mal chen po na mi snang bar mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:100a-12: mthong nas kyang khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:100a-15: gzhon nu grags pa ni rang gi mal chen po na mi gda' lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:100a-16: de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:100a-17: gzhon nu nor gyi phyir chom rkun nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:100a-18: g-yon can rnams kyis phyi rol tu khrid par ma gyur grang snyam du sems shing phyogs bzhir pho nya rta pa dag bkye nas rang nyid mi lag na sgron ma thogs pa rnams dang lhan cig tu 'bab chu gnod pa can gang na ba de logs su song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:100a-19: khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri bzung gcig phud pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:100b-0: mthong @100b nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:100b-1: gzhon nu ni nor gyi phyir chom rkun nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:100b-2: g-yon can rnams kyis phyi rol tu khrid kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:100b-3: 'di ltar 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri ba zung gcig phud pa las na gzhon nu 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi ngogs 'di nyid las brgal bar ma gyur grang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:100b-4: 'di ltar 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri bzung gcig bor ro snyam du bsams nas 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi ngogs de nyid las brgal te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:100b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo rgyang ring po nas gzigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:100b-6: gzigs nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te ci nas kyang ngas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par 'du byas pas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos gzhon nu grags pa stan 'di nyid la 'dug bzhin du mi mthong ba de lta bu zhig bya'o snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:100b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos gzhon nu grags pa stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du mi mthong ba de lta bu mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:100b-8: de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:100b-10: cig gzhon nu grags pa gzigs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:100b-11: khyim bdag de'i phyir 'dug cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:101a-1: gzhon nu grags pa mthong bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:101a-2: de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:101a-3: gdon mi za bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu grags pa gzigs par gyur te 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces khyim bdag de'i phyir 'dug cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:101a-4: stan 'di kho na la gzhon nu grags pa 'dug pa mthong bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do zhes bka' stsal to snyam du rig nas dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:101a-7: dga' ba rgya chen po dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:106b-3: nga yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing 'gro'o zhes zer gyi; ma la bdag gis de la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:106b-5: dkrug pa'i las shig bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:106b-6: de nas bdud sdig can bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sbrul te; bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:106b-7: ma grol grol bar 'du shes na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:106b-8: ji ltar bdag nyid grol bar sems //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:106b-9: bdag nyid dge sbyong ma bkrol bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:106b-10: 'ching ba chen pos bcings pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:106b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:106b-12: ae ma'o 'di ni bdud sdig can yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:106b-14: dkrug pa'i las kyi phyir nye bar 'ongs so snyam du thugs su chud nas tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:106b-15: nga ni lha dang mi rnams kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:106b-16: 'ching ba gang yin kun las grol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:106b-17: bar chad byed pa khyod bcom par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:106b-18: sdig can de ltar shes par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:106b-19: de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:106b-20: dge sbyong goo ta ma'i sems kyis bdag shes so snyam du rig nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la yid la gcags nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:107a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gnyis su'ang dge @107a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:107a-1: slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:107a-4: mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:107a-7: mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:107a-9: skye bo mang po la phan pa dang zhes bya ba nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:107a-10: rgyu zhing deng zhig ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:107a-11: nga yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:107a-13: bka' bzhin 'tshal lo zhes dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las nyid mnyan nas ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:107a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis w'a ra n'a sir ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te; rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang grong khyer sde can du byon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:107a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das ras bal can gyi nags tshang tshing gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas shing zhig gi drung du brten te nyin bar gyi gnas pas bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:107a-16: de'i tshe drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs grong khyer sde can gyi phyi rol tu nyi ma re re zhing bud med kyis byas pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:107a-18: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na de rnams las bud med cig dam bcas pa dral te bros so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:107b-0: de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs bud med de tshol zhing ras @107b bal gyi nags tshang tshing gang na ba der dong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:107b-1: drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:107b-5: thugs mchog tu dul ba; zhi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:107b-7: gser gyi mchod sdong lta bur dpal gyis 'bar zhing shing zhig drung na brten te bzhugs pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:107b-8: mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:107b-10: ji ga bud med gcig gzigs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:107b-12: bud med de khyed cag gi cir 'ong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:107b-14: 'di na bdag cag drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs grong khyer sde can gyi slad rol tu bud med kyis bgyis pa'i rol mos rtse bar bgyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:107b-16: dga' mgur spyod par bgyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:107b-17: de rnams dang bdag cag rtse bar bgyid /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:107b-19: dga' mgur spyod par bgyid pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:107b-20: bud med gcig dam bcas pa dral te bros nas bdag cag tshol lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:107b-23: bud med tshol ba gang yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:107b-26: bdag cag la bud med kyis ci bgyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:107b-27: bdag cag ni bdag nyid tshol ba gang lags pa de 'dam lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:107b-29: de'i phyir 'dug cig dang khyed la chos bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108a-0: de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das @108a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108a-1: kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108a-2: phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108a-3: de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po; 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108a-8: de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis chos mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108a-11: chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108a-12: som nyi las brgal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108a-13: the tshom las brgal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108a-14: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108a-15: gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108a-16: ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108a-22: dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108a-23: bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108b-0: deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs @108b su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108b-1: de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i nub mo 'das nas snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108b-4: lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te grong khyer sde can du bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sde can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108b-6: ma la ngas grong khyer sde can der thog mar su zhig la chos bshad snyam pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108b-8: ngas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108b-9: dga' stobs ma la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108b-10: de dag gis ba sngon sdug bsngal spong ba'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson pas gnas pa na 'dir mar gsar dang 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar bas bsnyen bkur byas so snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108b-12: dga' stobs ma'i khyim gang na ba der gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108b-13: grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108b-14: dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:108b-15: mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:109a-3: gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs su gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:109a-5: bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:109a-6: de nas grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:109a-7: dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:109a-9: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:109a-10: dga' stobs ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan ces bya ba nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:109a-11: mngon par dad nas skyabs su song ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:109a-12: de nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:109a-13: dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:109a-15: de'i slad du 'dir zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:109a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:109a-17: dga' stobs ma la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:109a-18: de nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:109a-19: dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig cing bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:109a-20: bca' bdag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:109a-21: rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:109b-0: bca' ba dag rang gi @109b lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:109b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin te phyag bcabs shing lhung bzed gyur bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:109b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:109b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:109b-4: dga' stobs ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:109b-7: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:109b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sde can nas gshegs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:109b-9: ngas yul ma ga dha 'dir ngang tshul bzang por bkur ba'i dge sbyong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:109b-10: bram ze gang zhig dbang du byas na de dbang du gyur pas tshegs chung dus skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du 'gyur ba su zhig yod snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:109b-11: de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa rgas pa 'khogs gtugs pa zhig yod pa de ma ga dha'i mi rnams kyis bkur stir bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:109b-14: mchod par bya bas dgra bcom par bkur cing 'khor lnga brgya dang nee ranydza n'i'i chu klung gi 'gram gyi bsti gnas na dka' thub spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:109b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110a-0: lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa rgas 'khogs gtugs @110a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110a-1: pa 'di ma ga dha'i mi rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas dka' thub spyod do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110a-2: ma la ngas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dbang du bya ste; 'di dbang du gyur na tshegs chung dus skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du 'gyur ro snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas ga na ba der gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110a-4: lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110a-5: mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110a-11: yun ring po zhig lags na gang nas 'khor 'dir byon /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110a-12: dge sbyong chen po; gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110a-14: de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110a-15: bcom ldan 'das lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110a-16: mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110b-0: gal te khyod la mi bde ba med na khyod kyi me khang du nga zhag gcig @110b cig 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110b-2: bdag la mi bde ba ma mchis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110b-3: 'on kyang de na klu gdug pa zhig gnas te des khyod la mtho ba tsams par gyur du mchi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110b-5: khyod kyis re zhig gnang bar gyis shig dang mtho btsams par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110b-7: gal te khyod la mtho mi 'tsham na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110b-9: ci bde kho nar bzhugs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi me khang gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas me khang gi phyi rol tu zhabs bsil nas me khang gi nang du zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110b-11: nyid kyis rtsva'i gding ba bshams nas sku drang por bsrang ste skyil mo krung bcas nas dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag ste bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110b-12: klu gdug pas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110b-13: mthong nas kyang khros pa'i mthus dud pa byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus dud pa phyung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110b-15: klu gdug pas khro ba'i mthus 'bar bar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang me'i khams la snyoms par bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110b-17: de nas klu gdug pa khros pa'i mthu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus me khang thams cad 'bar /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110b-20: kun tu rab tu 'bar te; me lce gcig tu gyur pas sreg par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:110b-21: lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can mtshan mo rgyu skar la lta ba na me khang thams gcad 'bar /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:111a-1: tu gyur nas sreg pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:111a-2: mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:111a-3: dge sbyong chen po goo ta ma 'di ltar mdzes par klu gdug pas thal bar byas par ma gyur grang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:111a-5: bdag gi tshig mnyan to snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:111a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:111a-7: nga lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor dang bcas pas phyas spyad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:111a-8: ma la ngas rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba la sems mnyam par bzhag na mes klu gdug pa'i me zil gyis mnan la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:111a-9: des kyang de'i lus la gnod par mi byed cing de dul bar byas nas lhung bzed kyi nang du bcug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:111a-10: lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de la sbyin pa de lta bu zhig bya'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:111a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pa la thugs mnyam par bzhag na mes klu gdug pa'i me zil gyis mnan la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:111a-12: des kyang de'i lus la gnod pa mi byed pa de lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:111a-13: de dul bar mkhyen nas lhung bzed du bcug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:111a-14: lteng rgyas 'od srung gang na ba der bsnams te gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:111a-15: lteng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:111a-16: mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:111b-0: khyod kyi lhung @111b bzed na bsnams te byon pa ci /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:111b-2: klu gdug pa gang gi mthus khyod kyi me khang du mir gyur ba rdzu 'phrul dang mi ldan pa gnas su mi ster ba de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:111b-3: ngas btul nas lhung bzed du bcug nas khyer te 'ongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:111b-4: de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:114a-14: de lta mod kyi 'dir mdang sum rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na nga gang na ba der 'ongs te lhag nas nga'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te de rnams /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:114b-12: zhes bya ba'i bar de dag pas kyang ches lhag cing ches 'phags la ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:114b-14: dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115a-1: 'od srung ral pa can gyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun pa byed pa la bab po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115a-2: de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115a-3: gal te ma ga dha'i mi rnams kyis dge sbyong chen po 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin par shes na de nyid la bya ba byed par sems kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115a-4: bdag la ni de lta ma yin pa'i gnas yod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115a-5: kye ma; dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang ci ma rung snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas zhag bdun gzhan du bzhud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115a-7: de'i tshe zhag bdun du lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la rnyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115a-8: bkur sti chen po byung nas bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115a-9: bca' bar rab tu mang po dang ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115a-10: skye bo'i tshogs chen po'ang dbang du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115a-11: de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byas zin pa dang 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115a-12: zhag bdun po 'di la bdag la rnyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115a-13: bkur sti chen po byung nas bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115a-14: bca' ba rab tu mang po dang ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115a-15: skye bo'i tshogs chen po'ang dbang du gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115a-16: kye ma da ni dge sbyong chen po 'ongs kyang ci ma rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115a-17: bdag gis de'ang de la bsod snyoms spyod du gzhug go snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas @115b lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115b-1: lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115b-2: mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115b-8: khyod ci'i slad du zhag bdun 'di nas bzhud lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115b-9: 'od srung khyod kyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byed pa la bab nas 'di snyam du gal te ma ga dha'i mi rnams kyis dge sbyong chen po ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba yin no bar shes na de kho na la bya ba byed par sems kyi bdag la ni de ltar ma yin pa'i gnas 'di yod par 'gyur gyis kye ma dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang ci ma rung snyam sems pa ma yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115b-10: nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems shes nas zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115b-11: 'o na ci'i slad du 'dir byon lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115b-12: 'od srung khyod kyi mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byas zin nas 'di snyam du bdag la zhag bdun du rnyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115b-13: bkur sti chen po byung zhing bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115b-14: bca' ba rab tu mang po dang yang ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115b-15: skye bo'i tshogs chen po'ang dbang du gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115b-16: kye ma dge sbyong chen po 'ongs kyang ci ma rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:115b-17: bdag gis de yang de la yongs su longs spyod du gzhug go snyam du sems pa ma yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:116a-3: nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems shes nas nga 'ongs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:116a-5: ci bde ba kho nar longs spyad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:116a-6: de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:116a-7: 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:116a-8: ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:116a-9: de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:116a-11: de'i slad du bdag gi nye 'khor du bzhugs shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:116a-12: bdag gis khyod la chos dang mthun pa'i 'tsho ba sbyar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:116a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:116a-14: de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du rang kho nas g-yos byas nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:116a-16: gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:116a-18: da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:116a-20: de'i phyir song zhig nga'ang 'ong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:116b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shing dzambu zhes bya ba gang @116b gis dzambu'i gling du gdags pa de las kha dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:116b-2: ro dang ldan pa'i dzambu'i snye ma rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas bsnams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:116b-3: lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der gshegs pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:116b-4: de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'ongs nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das bsti gnas kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:116b-5: mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:116b-11: khyod kyi lhung bzed na ci mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:116b-12: 'dir ngas 'od srung khyod song na sring po ma lon par mkhyen nas /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:132b-14: ngas lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa'i mi las 'das pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho zhes bya ba nas /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:132b-17: ngas de ltar mkhyen cing de ltar gzigs pas nga 'di skad ces bdag gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:132b-19: zhes bya ba nas tshor ba po zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:132b-21: 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing da ltar yang yod pa ma yin pas gang gis de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133a-0: der sdig pa'i las byas pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong zhing gang gis phung po 'di bor te phung po gzhan @133a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133a-2: nying mtshams sbyor ba de chos su brdar btags pa ma gtogs pa 'di yin no zhes mi gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133a-3: de la chos kyi brdar btags pa ni 'di yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133a-8: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133a-9: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133a-10: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133a-13: gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133a-14: skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133a-15: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133a-16: tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133a-17: sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133a-18: len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133a-19: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133a-20: skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133a-26: de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133a-28: 'di med pas 'di med la 'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133a-31: 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133a-32: rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133a-36: skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133b-4: skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133b-10: de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133b-12: 'du byed rnams ni sdug bsngal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133b-13: mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133b-14: rgyu kun 'byung bas sdug bsngal kun 'byung zhing rgyu 'gags pas sdug bsngal 'gag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133b-15: rgyun bcad pas mi 'byung zhing nying mtshams sbyor ba med pas 'gags pa 'di nyid ni sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133b-17: de la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133b-18: gzhan med kyi sdug bsngal 'gag pa gang yin pa de ni nye bar zhi ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133b-19: de ni bsil bar gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133b-22: zhi ba'i gnas ni 'di yin te; 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133b-23: phung po thams cad spangs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133b-25: 'dod chags dang bral ba 'gags pa mya ngan las 'das pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:133b-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang ma ga dha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la lan gnyis su bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:134a-1: so; ;mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:134a-5: mi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la cig 'phags pa'i nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa de dag 'di ni bdag yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:134a-7: 'di ni bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag tu khas len par byed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:134a-15: rnam par shes pa rtag gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:134a-18: mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:134a-22: mi rtag pa sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la cig 'phags pa'i nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:134a-24: 'di ni bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag tu khas len par byed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:134a-28: de lta bas na khyod kyi gzugs gang ci'ang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:134a-37: gang dag thag nye ba'ang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:134a-38: de thams cad la 'di ni bdag ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:134b-0: bdag ni 'di ma yin @134b no; ;'di ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no zhes de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:134b-2: de lta bas na khyod kyis tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:134b-3: 'du shes dang; 'du byed gang ci'ang rung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:134b-4: rnam par shes pa gang ci'ang rung ba 'das pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:134b-14: gang dag thag nye ba'ang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:134b-15: de dag thams cad la 'di ni bdag ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:134b-17: 'di ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no zhes de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:134b-19: 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa de ltar mthong ba ni gzugs la'ang yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:134b-23: rnam par shes pa la'ang yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:134b-24: yid byung na 'dod chags dang 'bral lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:134b-25: 'dod chags dang bral ba na rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:134b-26: rnam par grol na bdag gi skye ba zad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:134b-27: tshangs par spyod pa bsten to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:134b-29: srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:134b-30: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na ma ga dha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:135a-2: ma ga dha'i bram ze dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:135a-3: khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:135a-4: de nas ma ga dha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos chos mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:135a-7: chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:135a-8: som nyi las brgal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:135a-9: the tshom las brgal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:135a-10: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:135a-11: gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:135a-12: ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang nab de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:135a-13: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:135a-17: bdag btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:135a-19: dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyi dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:135a-20: deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:135a-23: dge slong gi dge 'dun du bcas pa la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:135b-0: bsnyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen @135b bkur bgyid lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:135b-2: rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:135b-4: rgyal po'i khab kyi ma ga dha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:135b-5: de nas ma ga dha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:135b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma ga dha nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:135b-7: de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na mu stegs yang dag rgyal ba can zhes bya ba skyes nas ring po ma lon par de rnams kyi ston pa dus byas par gyur pa dang; de rnams kyi nang na nye rgyal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:135b-8: pang nas skyes zhes bya ba gnyis tshogs yongs su bsdus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:135b-9: tshogs kyi 'dren par gyur ba gang yin pa de yongs su 'dren pa na de gnyis kyis 'di ltar yu bu cag las gcig gis 'dud rtsi sngar rnyed kyang de gcig la gcig smra bar bya'o zhes dam bca' ba byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:135b-10: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:135b-12: chos gos thogs te 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136a-1: bzed thogs pa mdzes pas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136a-2: de'i tshe na kun tu rgyu nye rgyal rgyal po'i khab tu bya ba zhig gi phyir spyod yul du zhugs pas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136a-10: lhung bzed thogs pa mdzes pas rgyal po'i khab na bsod snyoms la rgyu ba thag ring po kho nas mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136a-11: mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136a-12: rgyal po'i khab 'dir rab tu byung pa ji snyed lhags shing gnas pa dag las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136a-14: rab tu byung ba 'di'i spyod lam 'di lta bu ni bdag gis sngon chad 'ga' yang ma mthong gi ma la bdag de'i gan du song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136a-15: dge slong khyed kyi ston pa ni gang yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136a-16: gang gi phyir ni rab tu byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136a-17: su'i chos la ni dga' zhes dri'o snyam du rig nas lam po che rub ba zhig na 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136a-18: ldog pas shas cher sdod cing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136a-19: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul kun tu rgyu nye rgyal ga la ba der song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136a-20: de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136a-22: khyod kyi ston pa ni gang yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136a-23: gang gi phyir ni rab tu byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136a-25: tshe dang ldan pa sh'akya'i sras kyi dge sbyong goo ta ma sh'akya'i ris las skra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136b-0: kha spu bregs nas gos dur smrig dag bgos te dad pa yang @136b dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba zhig yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136b-1: de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kho bo'i ston pa ni bcom ldan 'das de yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136b-2: kho bo de'i phyir rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136b-3: kho bo de'i chos la dga'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136b-7: kho bo ni na gzhon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136b-8: rab tu byung ba gsar pas de'i phyir kho bos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i bstan pa rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par sla ba ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136b-9: 'on kyang 'di ltar de'i don bstan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136b-11: kho bo la ni don dgos kyi tshig ni shin tu mang pos kyang ci bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136b-12: khyod kyis don mang yang rung nyung yang rung ston cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136b-13: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136b-14: chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136b-15: de yi rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa'ang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136b-17: de skad gsung ba'i tshul can dge sbyong che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136b-18: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136b-19: kun tu rgyu nye rgyal chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136b-20: de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal chos mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136b-23: chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:136b-24: som nyi las brgal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137a-2: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137a-3: gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137a-4: ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas ro stod bsrang nas lag pa g-yas pa brkyang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137a-5: tshe dang ldan pa rta thul ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137a-6: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137a-7: skyob pa rnams kyi chos 'di yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137a-8: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137a-9: sngon chad ma mthong ma thos pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137a-10: 'chi med mya ngan med pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137a-13: bcom ldan 'das de da lta ga la bzhugs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137a-15: rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas 'di nyid na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137a-16: de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis smras pa la mngon par bstod pa dang rjes su yi rang ba byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137a-17: tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137a-18: tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la lan gsum bskor ba byas te song nas kun rgyu pang nas skyes ga la ba der song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137a-19: kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes kyis kun tu rgyu nye rgyal thag ring po kho nas mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137a-20: mthong nas kyang kun tu rgyu nye rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137a-22: khyod kyi dbang po rnams ni rnam par dvangs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137a-23: bzhin gyi mdog ni yongs su dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137a-24: pags pa'i mdog ni yongs su dkar na khyod kyis bdud rtsi rnyed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137b-2: de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137b-3: chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137b-4: de yi rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137b-6: de skad gsung pa'i tshul can dge sbyong che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137b-8: da dung yang lan gcig brjod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137b-11: chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137b-12: zhes pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
