K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137b-28: 'chi med mya ngan med pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:137b-31: bcom ldan 'das de da lta ga la bzhugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138a-0: @138a *// rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas 'di nyid na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138a-3: bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138a-5: de'i phyir rje 'khor la blta bar bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138a-6: bdag cag lta bu mi grags pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138a-7: shes par gyur pa dag gis 'khor la blta ba ni legs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138a-8: de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138a-9: pang nas skyes gnyis kyis bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138a-12: kho bo cag gnyis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod par byed na khyed cag ji ltar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138a-13: mkhan po gnyis bdag cag cung zad ci 'tshal ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad mkhan po gnyis las brten nas 'tshal ba lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138a-14: gal te mkhan po gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs pa spyad pa spyod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138a-15: bdag cag kyang mkhan po gnyis rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138a-17: da de'i dus la bab par shes par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138a-18: de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138a-19: pang nas skyes gnyis 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu lnga bcu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138a-20: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138b-0: de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la chos ston @138b cing bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138b-2: pang nas skyes gnyis thag ring po kho nas gzigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138b-3: gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138b-5: khyod kyis grogs po'i tshogs yongs su sdud pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138b-10: pang nas skyes gnyis mthong ngam; btsun pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138b-12: 'di gnyis ni nyan thos zung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138b-15: gcig ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138b-16: gcig shos ni shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138b-17: de nas dge slong zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138b-18: ston pa dgongs yul mtha' yas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138b-19: skyes bu'i dbang po mkhyen mthar byon //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138b-20: bcom ldan srid pa mthar mdzad pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138b-21: grogs po nye rgyal pang nas skyes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138b-22: 'od ma'i tshal du ma phyin par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138b-23: de ltar mchi ba gzigs gyur nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138b-24: tshogs mchog dbus su de gnyis ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138b-25: 'di gnyis nga yi nyan thos kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138b-26: zung mchog 'gyur zhes des bstan te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138b-27: gcig ni rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138b-28: gcig shos shes rab ldan pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138b-29: mchog tu 'gyur bar lung bstan mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:138b-30: de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:139a-0: pang nas skyes gnyis bcom ldan 'das ga la der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi @139a *//

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:139a-4: bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:139a-5: bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por gnang na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:139a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu byung zhing /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:139a-12: lag na lhung bzed thogs pa skra dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:139a-18: mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:139a-19: sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:140b-14: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po zas gtsang la spring yig bskur ba /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:140b-21: rgyal po zas gtsang lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas pho nya gang dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:141a-1: pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byung ngo snyam nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa 'char kas mthong nas smras pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:141a-6: gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa dka' ba spyod pa de'i tshe kho bos sbring yig skyel ba'i mi btang ba las de dag kho bo'i gan du 'ongs nas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bzhugs pa 'di dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:141a-8: da ni kho bos spring yig skyel ba'i mi btang na 'ga' yang phrin yig khyer te mi 'ong na ji ltar sems khong du chud par mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:141a-10: lha; bdag mchis te bka' mchid 'tshal la slar mchi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:141a-11: rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:141a-15: de'i bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas de nyid du 'dug pas khyod kyang song na de nyid du 'dug par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:141a-18: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang rang nyid kyis spring yig bris pa; lhums su zhugs pa bzung nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:141a-19: khyod ni bdag gis cher bskrun te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:141a-20: nyon mongs me rab 'bar bzhin du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:141a-21: rgyal ba ljon shing la bsten na //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:141b-7: gang tshe thog ma bltams pa na //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:141b-14: gshegs par dgongs pa mdzad du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:141b-15: zhes spring pa'i yi ge 'char kas khyer nas chas te rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:141b-16: lam gyis dub pa ngal bsos nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol ba'i yi ge lags so zhes bcom ldan 'das la yi ge phul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:141b-17: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bzhes nas bklags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:141b-18: bklags nas yi ge mtha' gcig tu bzhag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:141b-22: ser skya'i gzhir mi bzhud dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:141b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:142a-0: @142a *// 'char ka sngon bcom ldan 'das dang lhag par 'dris pa yin pas de sngon gyi 'dris pa kho nas gsol pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:142a-12: gang zhig bcom nas brtsegs pa med gyur cing //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:142a-25: rab tu byung ba yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:142a-26: khyod kyang rab tu byung zhig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:142b-4: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na yab dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:142b-9: bla ma'i gnas lta bu rnams kyis chos dang mthun pa'i tshig lan 'ga' yang slar ma bzlog pas /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:142b-15: 'char ka 'di ni yun ring po'i don dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:142b-17: bde ba'i phyir rab tu phyung zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:142b-19: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la mnyan nas 'char ka rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:142b-20: bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag de la rgyas par smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:142b-22: 'di ni khyod kyi bya ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:142b-23: deng phan chad bud med dang lhan cig khang pa gcig tu nyal bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143a-0: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes 'char kas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos @143a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143a-2: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143a-4: ser skya'i gzhir mchi lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143a-7: song la khyod mod kho nar rgyal po'i khab tu ma 'jug par sgor sdod la sh'akya'i dge slong 'ongs so zhes brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143a-8: gal te nang du spyod cig zer na 'jug par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143a-9: zhugs nas gal te sh'akya'i dge slong gzhan yang yod dam zhes zer na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143a-10: yod do zhes brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143a-11: gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'ang 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra 'am zhes 'dri na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143a-12: 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143a-13: khyod kyis rgyal po'i khab tu'ang gnas par mi bya'o; ;gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'ang rgyal po'i khab tu gnas par mi byed dam zhes 'dri na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143a-14: mi bzhugs so zhes brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143a-15: gal te gang du gnas par byed ces 'dri na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143a-17: gtsug lag khang du 'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143a-18: gal te gtsug lag khang ci 'dra zhes 'dri na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143a-19: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa bris te bstan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143a-20: gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon nam zhes 'dri na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143a-21: byon no zhes brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143a-22: ji srid cig na byon zhes 'dri na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143b-0: zhag bdun @143b lon na'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143b-6: sa bdag rnams ni tshig gis te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143b-8: de bzhin bsam gtan pa rnams kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143b-9: sems bskyed pas ni thams cad 'grub //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de ji ltar skad cig de nyid la grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir song ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143b-11: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la dad pa drag po skyes pa de rgyal po'i khab kyi sgor bsdad nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143b-13: rgyal po la sh'akya'i dge slong mchis so zhes gsol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143b-19: de rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143b-23: de nang du zhugs pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:143b-27: khyod slar 'ong ngo zhes smras pa ma yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144a-0: 'char kas smras pa; lha; bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di lta bu ma yin no zhes bka' stsal nas chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa'i phyir bdag rab tu byung mod kyi @144a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144a-1: bdag rang gi dad pas kyang rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144a-2: rgyal pos yan lag thams cad kyi 'khyud nas stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug tu bcug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144a-3: de'i don du chur btsags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144a-4: 'bras bu btags pa gtsang sbra byas te zar bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144a-6: mchog tu nye bar zhi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144a-7: dul bar gnas pa dang ldan zhing ji skad rjes su bstan pa'i cho gas yongs su longs spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144a-8: rgyal pos de la brtags nas ngo mtshar skyes te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144a-11: gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'ang 'di 'dra bar nye bar zhi ba yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144a-13: lha; bdag gi dul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144a-14: nye bar zhi ba ni cung zad tsam lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144a-15: dper ji lta bu ri rab dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144a-20: srin bu me khyer bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144a-22: padma'i rtsa ba'i bu ga bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144a-23: rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144a-25: gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'ang 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144a-27: rgyal po zas gtsang ba rgyal nas sa la 'gyel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144a-28: chu mang du btab nas dbugs slar phyung ste smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144a-30: gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144b-0: dus ji tsam na dgung bdun lon @144b na'o; ;rgyal po zas gtsang gis blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144b-2: gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon par 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144b-4: pho brang byi dor byos shig 'char kas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144b-5: bcom ldan 'das ni pho brang du bzhugs par mi mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144b-11: rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144b-13: gtsug lag khang ci 'dra ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144b-14: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa ri mor bris te bstan to; ;de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144b-16: n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144b-17: khang phran drug cu brtsig tu chug cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144b-18: lha; bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang las mnyan nas n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144b-19: khang phran drug cu brtsig tu bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:144b-22: song la dge slong rnams la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te yab sras gdan 'dzom na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145a-0: khyod cag las su zhig lta bar spro ba @145a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145a-1: de chos gos dag long zhig ces bsgo zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145a-3: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa monggal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145a-5: bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145a-7: khyed cag las su lta bar spro ba de chos gos dag long zhig ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145a-12: 'khor dbugs phyin pa rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145a-13: dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145a-14: 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145a-16: khyu mchog ba lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145a-17: glang po che glang po'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145a-18: seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145a-19: ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145a-20: nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145a-21: bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145a-22: sman pa mkhas pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145a-23: dpa' bo ru pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145a-24: lam mkhan 'gron po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145b-0: ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bsko ra ba lta @145b bu; khams kyi rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145b-1: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145b-2: zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145b-3: nyi ma 'od zer stong gis bskor ba lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145b-4: yul 'khor skyong dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145b-5: 'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145b-6: mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu; rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145b-7: thags bzang ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145b-8: brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145b-9: tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145b-10: rgya mtsho g-yo ba med pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145b-11: sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145b-12: glang po dam pa dregs pa dang bral ba ltar dbang po rnams shin tu dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145b-13: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par mdzes par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145b-14: 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i sku nyi ma'i 'od zer stong pas lhag pa'i 'od can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145b-15: rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145b-18: ma 'dres pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:145b-19: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:146a-0: dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu @146a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:146a-1: 'bab chu ro hi ta kar byon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:146a-2: rgyal po zas gtsang gis gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'bab chu ro hi ta kar byon to zhes thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:146a-3: thos nas kyang rgyal po zas gtsang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi rdo ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:146a-5: gseg ma rnams bsal nas tsandan gyi chus chag chag btab /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:146a-6: dri shin tu zhim po'i pog por nye bar bshams /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:146a-7: dar gyi chun 'chang mang po dbyangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:146a-8: gang yang 'bab chu ro hi ta ka nas gang yang n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra ba de'i bar gyi lam shin tu mdzes par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:146a-9: sa phyogs yangs shing rgya che bar gdan rnam par bkra ba dag gshom du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:146a-10: de nas 'bab chu ro hi ta ka la dge slong kha cig ni lag pa 'khru bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:146a-11: kha ci gi ni so shing 'dor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:146a-12: kha cig ni khrus byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:146a-13: ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i sh'akya rnams kyis gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa gshegs so zhes thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:146a-14: thos nas kyang kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:146a-15: kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes nas thams cad n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra ba nas byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:146a-16: ci yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:146a-17: 'on te sras yab kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa lta'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:146a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:146b-0: gal te nga zhabs kyis @146b ser skya'i gzhir gshegs na sh'akya'i nga rgyal can rnams kye ma'o gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas dka' thub kyi nags su gshegs nas ltog po zhig grub pa lta zhig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:146b-1: des lha brgya stong phrag dums zhabs 'bring byas nas steng gi nam mkha' las gshegs te des de srid du dka' ba brgya stong spyad pas bdud rtsi thob nas nga zhabs kyis gshegs pa lta zhes ma dad pa skyes par 'gyur ro snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:146b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs mnyam par bzhag na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:146b-3: shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:146b-9: me'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:146b-10: me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:146b-17: shel gyi kha dog dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:146b-18: cho 'phrul zung du'ang ston par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:146b-19: sku'i smad nas me 'bar bar mdzad la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:146b-20: sku'i stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad de sku'i stod nas me 'bar bar mdzad la sku'i smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs pa mdzad pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147a-0: @147a *// shar phyogs la ji lta bar lho dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147a-2: byang phyogs su'ang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147a-3: phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147a-4: rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du mdzad pa de bsdus te ta la bdun gyi srid tsam na bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147a-5: dge slong rnams ni ta la drug gi srid tsam na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147a-6: bcom ldan 'das drug gi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147a-7: bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid tsam na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147a-8: bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gsum gyi srid tsam na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147a-9: bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gnyis kyi srid tsam na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147a-10: bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams ta la gcig gi srid tsam na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147a-11: bcom ldan 'das mi bdun gyi srid tsam na bzhugs na ni dge slong rnams mi drug gi srid tsam na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147a-12: bcom ldan 'das drug gi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147a-13: bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid tsam na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147a-14: bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gsum gyi srid tsam na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147a-15: bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gnyis kyi srid tsam na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147b-0: bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams mi gang @147b lhag tsam na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147b-1: bcom ldan 'das mi gang lhag tsam na ni dge slong rnams sa la'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147b-2: rgyal po zas gtsang gis cho 'phrul de lta bu de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147b-3: dge slong mang po mthong nas de la bcom ldan 'das gang yin pa ma shes te mongs par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147b-4: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147b-6: 'di na ngur smrig gyon pa'i rab tu byung ba mang po zhig yod na de la gzhon nu gang yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147b-7: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bcom ldan 'das bstan nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147b-9: srid pa'i mthar byed sems kyi dbang phyug 'dren pa lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147b-10: 'di ni nyon mongs sel mdzad nyin byed don ni kun tu ston mdzad lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147b-11: 'di ni dgongs pa bzhin brnyes stobs bcu mnga' bas kun gyi pha rol gshegs pa lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147b-12: dri med btsal ba chos kyi dbang phyug khyod kyi sras lags mi dbang de gzigs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147b-13: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis lus btud nas zhabs la phyag byas te tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147b-14: blo gros yangs pa khyod la 'di dang ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147b-15: kun spyan zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147b-16: bltams pa'i tshe nas ni g-yos pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147b-17: dzambu'i grib mas sku las ma 'das pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:147b-19: sh'akya mo rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs pa mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:148a-0: de ltar yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa ci'i tha [?] @148a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:148a-1: tshig ces ma dad pa bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:148a-2: rgyal po zas gtsang gis sh'akya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:148a-3: sh'akya mo rnams la go bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:148a-5: da gdod kho bos gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i zhabs la phyag byas pa ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:148a-6: gang gi tshe na gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bltams pa na sa chen po g-yos par gyur cing 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:148a-7: 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa nyi ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:148a-8: zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:148a-9: 'di ltar mthu che ba'i 'od kyi snang ba nyams su ma myong ba gang yin pa de'ang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur nas sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag snang ba des sems can dag gcig gis gcig mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:148a-11: sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:148a-13: sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta zhes ngo shes par gyur pa de'i tshe'ang kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:148a-14: gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa zhing las kyi mtha' la bzhugs pa na shing dzambu'i grib ma la bzhugs nas 'dod pa rnams las dben pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:148b-5: shar phyogs su bab kyang shing dzambu'i 'grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku las ma 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe yang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos des kho bo'i yid bsdus pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:148b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang phyag byas te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:148b-11: bltams pa'i tshe na sa 'di g-yos pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:148b-12: dzambu'i grib ma sku las ma 'das pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:148b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de brtul nas 'khor brgya phrag du ma zil gyis mnan nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:148b-15: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang skad 'dzer cing mig mchi mas gang bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:149a-35: nga yi bgo ba snam sbyar te //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:150b-11: gang las yid 'byung skyes pa dag /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:150b-13: rga dang na dang 'chi ba ste //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:150b-19: khyod ni 'jig rten chos brgyad kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:150b-20: ji lta bur yang ma gos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:150b-21: de nas rab dga' dang ba rgyas byas nas //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:151a-3: de thos pas zas dkar la sogs pa sh'akya bdun khri bdun stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te rgyal po zas gtsang ni ma gtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:151a-4: lha byin nga rgyal las nga rgyal can sdig pa 'dod pa des bden pa mthong bar ma byas pas khro bas kun nas bkris pa dang bcas pas smras pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:151b-1: 'khor lhag ma rnams las kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:151b-2: kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:151b-3: kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:151b-4: kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:151b-5: kha cig gis ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:151b-6: kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:151b-7: kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:151b-8: kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su song /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:151b-9: kha cig gis ni chos la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:151b-10: kha cig gis ni dge 'dun la ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:151b-11: 'khor de dag phal cher yang sangs rgyas la gzhol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:151b-13: dge 'dun la bab par bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:151b-14: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:151b-15: sngon ni bcom ldan 'das lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:151b-16: lha ma yin gyi 'gro bar bcas pas mchod pa dang; rjed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:151b-17: mngon du smra bar gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:151b-18: da lta ni mis mchod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:151b-19: lhas ni ma yin no snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:151b-20: de nas sh'akya gzhon nu zhig gis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:151b-21: drang srong chen po smra mchog dam chos kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:151b-22: char pas 'gro ba 'di ni tshim mdzad de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:151b-23: mi bzad lam du lhung ba'i 'jig rten 'di //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:151b-24: drangs te thar ba'i lam la spyod par mdzod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:152a-2: rgyal po zas gtsang ni 'di snyam du bdag gi bu 'ba' zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:152a-3: 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba yin no snyam ste lhag par dga' ba las gyur gyi mdor na de'i dregs pa spong du gzhug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:152a-4: rgyu gnyis kyis bden pa rnams mthong bar mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:152a-7: de la zhum pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:152a-8: shin tu dga' ba yod kyis /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:156a-1: to; ;bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnad bar mdzad du gsol /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:156a-12: de bzhin du bre bo zas la rgyal srid khyer cig ces smras pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:157a-14: bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi de nyid na bzhugs nas nyi ma gcig ni rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs tshod gsol /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:157b-0: dka' thub drag po'i brtul shugs kyi khyad par dag gis @157b lus gdungs pas lus mi mdzes par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:157b-1: mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:157b-3: lus mdzes pa ma yin na 'khor ci 'dra ba zhig gis bcom ldan 'das mdzes par 'gyur snyam pa las /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:157b-10: khyed cag ci zhig byed par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:157b-12: da ltar gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bla na med pa chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:157b-13: khyed cag ci'i phyir g-yog mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:157b-19: rgyal po zas gtsang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir dril sgrogs su bcug pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:157b-21: bre bo zas la bu gnyis yod pa ma 'gags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:157b-23: mi'i chen ni zhing blas kyi mtha' la lhag par brtson no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:157b-24: ma 'gags pa ni steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi la 'dug nas skyes pa med pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158a-2: ming chen la mas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158a-3: bu; rgyal pos dril sgrogs su bcug pa sh'akya rnams las khyim re nas re re rab tu phyung zhig ces bsgo yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158a-6: bdag ni rab tu mi 'byung gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158a-7: khyod kyi bu sdug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158a-8: bde ba dang ldan par gnas pa gang yin pa de rab tu phyung zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158a-9: bu; bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po can gyis sems can de la khyod 'gran mtsho la cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158a-10: yum khyod gang la dgyes pa de bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po can lags mod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158a-11: de ring la cung zad kyang ma bskur dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158a-12: ci bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158a-14: bu; de bzhin du byas te yid ches par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158a-15: des gzeb stong pa rdze'u yis bkang nas kha ras dkar pos bkris te rgya skegs la rgyas btsab nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158a-16: bu mo mngag gzhug ma'i lag tu bskur nas bsgo ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158a-17: gal te de na ci yod ces 'dri ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158a-18: ci yang ma mchis so zhes smros shig ;des de khyer nas song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158a-19: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158a-21: rang sangs rgyas kun shes la bsod snyoms phul ba gang yin pa de deng ci'i phyir zas kyis phongs par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158a-22: de'i zan sbyar bar bya'o zhes des rdze'u de rnams sran tshod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158b-0: tshod ma sna tshogs ro dang ldan pa'i @158b zas kyis bkang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158b-1: ji tsam na mngag gzhug mas der khyer nas ma 'gags pa'i drung du phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158b-9: bdag la ma byams na 'di stong par ci ste bskur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158b-10: gdon mi za bar 'di ci'ang ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i zas shig bskur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158b-11: re zhig blta'o zhes ji tsam na kha phye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158b-12: skyed mos tshal de thams cad zas kyi dri zhim pos gang bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158b-13: de bsnams nas ma 'gags pa mchog tu ya mtshan skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158b-14: de ma la gus pa yin pas des ma la zas kyi phud bskur nas spring ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158b-15: yum gdugs re re zhing zas ci yang ma yin zhes bgyi ba 'di lta bu bskur ba'i rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158b-16: des kyang mthong nas mchog tu ya mtshan skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158b-17: des ming chen la bstan nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158b-20: khyod la kho mos sngar bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen mo'i sems can mi'i skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa la khyod 'gran mtshol cig ces ma smras sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158b-22: yum de bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po dang ldan yang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158b-24: bdag ni rab tu mi 'byung ngo zhes ji ltar ming chen gnas skabs thams cad tu rab tu 'byung bar khas len du ma btub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:158b-25: de nas des ma 'gags pa la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159a-1: sgrogs su bcug pa sh'akya rnams la khyim re nas re re rab tu byung zhig ces bsgo na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159a-2: khyod ci rab tu byung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159a-6: rab tu byung ba la phan yon ci mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159a-8: khyim par mchis pa la phan yon ci mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159a-11: rab tu byung bas legs par bsgrubs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159a-12: mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159a-13: legs par ma bsgrubs na lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159a-15: khyim par 'dug ste legs par bskyangs na lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159a-17: ma bskyangs na sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159a-21: rab tu byung ba'i nyes dmigs gang lags pa de ni khyi man gnas pa'i phan yon lags pas de bas na khyim na gnas pa mi 'tshal gyi gnang bar mdzod cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159a-25: legs kyi de bzhin du gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159a-26: ma 'gags pa'i ne'u zla sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan yin pas de de'i drung du song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159a-27: de'i tshe sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan pi wang len te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159a-28: pi wang len pa na rgyud chad nas sgra gzhan du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159a-29: ma 'gags pa pi wang la byang ba yin pas des sgra ci 'dra bar gyur pa'i rtags bzung nas de sgor bsngad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159a-30: sgo srungs kyi mi la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159b-0: song la @159b rgyal po bzang ldan la ma 'gags pa lha'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas sgo na sdod cing mchis so zhes gsol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159b-1: sgo srung song nas sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159b-2: lha; ma 'gags pa lha'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas chab sgo na sdod cing mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159b-4: shes ldan ma 'gags pa la su 'gog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159b-5: shes ldan ma 'gags pa nang du thong zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159b-6: de nang du zhugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159b-7: rgyal pos 'khyud nas 'dug tu bcug ste smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159b-10: gang gi tshe khyod pi wang len pa na rgyud chad nas sgra gzhan du gyur pa nas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159b-11: de mchog tu ya mtshan skyes nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159b-13: khyod pi wang len pa la byang ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159b-14: sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159b-18: lha; rgyal po zas gtsang gis dril sgrogs su bcug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159b-19: sh'akya rnams las khyim re nas re re rab tu byung zhig par bsgo bas de khyod kyis mkhyen par mdzod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159b-22: gal te de lta na kho bo'ang rab tu 'byung ste gros bya ba yod kyi khyod de ring 'di nyid tu gnas thob cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159b-23: de de nyid du gnas btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:159b-24: mal cha bas rims bag gi dri ma can gyi gos kyis bting zhing me tog gi sil mas bkram pa'i mal du ma 'gags pa nyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160a-0: de'i 'og na me tog gi rtsa ba @160a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160a-1: yod pa'i reg pa de'i nyams su myong nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160a-2: ci; 'di 'og tu rdo phre'u yod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160a-3: de rnams kyis brtag pa brtsams par me tog gi rtsa ba zhig mthong nas de rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160a-4: ma 'gags pa mtshan mo mi bde zhing nyal nas nam langs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160a-7: ci ga bde bar gnyid log gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160a-9: lha; bde bar gnyid ma log go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160a-13: lha; rims bag gi dri can gyi gos bting bar me tog sil ma bkram pa'i me tog gi rtsa bas lus snad lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160a-14: rgyal pos mal 'cha' ba bkug nas khyod kyis rims bag gi dri can gyi gos bting ste ci bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160a-16: lha; bdag la dkor bas gtad pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160a-17: rgyal pos dkor ba bkug nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160a-18: khyod kyis rims bag gi dri can gyi gos phog ste ci bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160a-20: lha; bdag la tha ga pas gtad pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160a-21: rgyal pos tha ga pa bkug nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160a-22: khyod kyis ci'i phyir rims bag gi dri can gyi gos 'bul /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160a-24: lha; snam bu 'thag pa'i 'phro cung zhig lus pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160a-25: bdag rims kyis thebs bzhin bgyis pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160a-27: gzhon nu khyod kyis ji ltar shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160b-0: tsha ba'i reg @160b pa nyams su myong bas rims bag gi dri lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160b-1: rgyal po mchog tu ya mtshan skyes te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160b-2: shes ldan ma 'gags pa ni sh'akya'i skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160b-3: de nas sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160b-4: gzhon nu gal te kho bo rab tu byung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160b-5: lhas byin sh'akya rnams kyi rgyal por gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160b-6: sh'akya rnams la gnod pa byed par 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160b-7: ma la bdag cag thams cad 'dus la lhas byin spro ba bskyed par bya'o zhes sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis de bkug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160b-8: de nas thams cad 'dus nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160b-9: lhas byin kho bo cag thams cad rab tu 'byung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160b-12: gal te rab tu mi 'byung ngo zhes smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160b-13: sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan rab tu byung bar mi 'gyur gyi de la thabs shig bsham par bya ste bslu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi nyi ma la n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra bar sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul bstan pa de'i tshe bdag blo skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160b-16: ji ltar 'di'i sgyu mas skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du byed pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang dbang du bya'o zhes bsams so snyam nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160b-17: khyed cag rab tu 'byung na bdag ci ste 'dug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160b-18: sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis bsams pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:160b-19: 'di ni brdzun du smra ba yin gyi dam 'char bcug la 'gro ba mang pos so sor rig par bya'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:161a-1: nas rgyal pos tshig de glegs bu la bris nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir dril sgrogs su bcug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:161a-2: grong khyer ser skya'i gzhin gnas pa'i shes ldan dag nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:161a-6: lhas byin la sogs te sh'akya lnga ba rgya rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur gyi thos par gyis la rab tu dga' ba skyed cig ces bsgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:161a-7: lhas byin gyis de thos nas sdug bsngal chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:161a-8: yid mi bde ba skyed nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:161a-9: gal te bdag gis sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan nges par rab tu 'byung bar shes par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:161a-10: bdag khas len par mi 'gyur ba zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:161a-11: da ni gal te rab tu ma byung na brdzun du smra ba yin no zhes rgyal srid kyang thob par mi 'gyur bas thams cad kyi thams cad du dus 'dir zad dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:161a-12: ci rab tu byung la bdag rab tu byung bzhin du rgyal srid bya'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:161a-13: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te; sh'akya rnams kyi tha ma'i 'byor pa la blta'o snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:161a-14: des grong khyer de gseg ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:161a-16: tsandan gyi chus chag chag btab /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:161a-19: dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po dbyangs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:161a-20: shin tu dri zhim po'i phog phor nye bar bzhag me tog sna tshogs kyi sil mas dga' dga' ltar byed du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:161b-0: de @161b nas sh'akya brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor nas grong khyer gyi sgo nas seng ge'i khri la 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:161b-2: sh'akya gzhon nu ngo mtshar skyes pa rnams kyang skar khung khol ma can dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:161b-5: sh'akya rnams kyi 'byor pa la lta bar 'dod pa'i skyes pa'i tshogs yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa dag kyang lam po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:161b-8: sh'akya las su dag gis ni mnyes par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:161b-9: su dag gis ni thugs byung bar 'gyur bar brtag pa'i bram ze mtshan mkhan dang; ltas mkhan dag bkug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:161b-13: rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams kyi pha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:161b-15: so so'i shing rtar zhugs te phyir 'byung bar brtsams pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:161b-16: sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan sna la byung ba mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:161b-17: re zhig 'dis ni mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:161b-18: de bzhin du nam gru dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:161b-19: ma 'gags pa la sogs pa phyir phyung ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:161b-20: de rnams kyang mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:161b-21: de nas lhas byin phyir byung ste; de phyir byung ba na bya khras gtsug gi nor bu phrog pa mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas de rnams kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162a-0: 'di'i rtags dang sbyar na gdon mi za bar ston pa la @162a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162a-1: 'khus nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162a-4: ka ta mo ra ka dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162a-6: rgya mtshos sbyin rnams phyir byung ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162a-7: bong bu'i skad grags nas de dag kyang mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162a-8: 'di dag gis kyang nyan thos chen po rnams la tshig ngan pa smras nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162a-9: nye dga' glang po che la zhon nas phan tshun du lta bar byed pa na mu tig gi do shal lhung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162a-10: de glang po che las babs te blangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162a-11: de'ang de rnams kyis lung bstan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162a-12: 'di ha cang 'dod chen ches pas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162a-16: lhas sbyin la sogs pa sh'akya lnga brgya po de rnams skyed mos tshal du dus ston la 'gro ba bzhin du bzang pos 'gran cing bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162a-18: gal te ngas sh'akya rnams la dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu byung na kha cig gis ni mnyes par byed par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162a-19: kha cig gis ni mnyes par byed par mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162a-20: mnyes par byed par mi 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag gzhan du sems la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162a-21: dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba ni thams cad srid pa tha ma pa yin pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162b-0: ma @162b la; ngas thams cad dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162b-1: bzhi'i las kyis rab tu byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162b-2: bsnyen par rdzogs su gzhug go snyam du dgongs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162b-3: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa; dge slong dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162b-4: ser skya'i gzhi'i sh'akya rnams gsol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162b-5: bzhi'i las kyis rab tu byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162b-6: bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162b-8: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162b-9: rgyal po zas gtsang gis sh'akya rnams kyi 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor zhes bya ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162b-10: de rnams rab tu 'byin pa na skra 'dreg par btang nas sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyi skra 'dreg pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162b-11: de ngom zung gnag cir mchi ma 'dzag cing skad 'dzer cing dbugs brtsegs pas skra 'dreg par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162b-12: sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162b-15: de snying rje rje skad du gcom chung ngur dal bus tshig re re nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162b-16: lha; bdag dzambu'i gling gi skyes bu gtso bo rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid bgyid pha mi phal pa rnams la'ang bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ba lta zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162b-17: khyed kyis spangs te gson pa bas na gum mi bsngo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162b-18: sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:162b-19: nye bar 'khor khyod kyis rje bo la snying nye ba'i mnyes par bya ba bstan zin te chog gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:163a-0: ngas ji ltar mi phal che ba rnams la @163a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:163a-1: bsnyen bkur byed par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:163a-2: des phyogs gcig tu ras gcig bting nas sh'akya'i gzhon nu rnams la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:163a-3: shes ldan gzhon nu dag nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:163a-4: 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor 'dis bdag cag la bkur sti byas la bdag cag kyang slar khyim du mi gnas kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:163a-5: rgyan rnams de'i 'tsho ba'i rkyen du ras kyi steng du zhog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:163a-6: de rnams kyi se mo do dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:163a-11: rna rgyan la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i rgyan khyad par can rnams kyis ras kyi steng du phung po chen por spungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:163a-12: nye bar 'khor gyis de rnams mthar gyis skra bregs te de rnams khrus la dong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:163a-13: des bsams pa; re zhig gzhon nu 'di dag rigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:163a-15: lang tsho la bab cing chung ma dang ldan la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:163a-17: bang mdzod kyis rgyas pa'ang spangs nas rab tu byung na bdag rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:163a-18: gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes na bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo las brgal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:163a-19: sbyor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir btsal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:163a-20: 'bad pa la brtson par bya ba zhig snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:163b-0: @163b ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs pa de bzhin du nyan thos chen po rnams kyang byad pas; tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor lhag par skyo ba skyes pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:163b-1: mthong nas kyang 'dreg mkhan nye ba 'khor gang na pa der song ste phyin nas 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-001:163b-3: khyod ci'i phyir shin tu mi dga' bas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug /
